name: Gaming SE Black Edition
description:
Gaming StackExchange is QA site for video gamers. I like dark site, specially when I spend there a lot of time in reading, so here it is my revised version. 

Hope you like, please report any bugs or suggestions.

Warning: This version is still in beta and not yet optimized.
additional_info:
22/11/2011
Fixed background of tags description
Fixed comment hover background

08/07/2011
Fixed WYSIWYG toolbar background

23/05/2011
ItemBox fixes
Background for images changed to white (formulas use black on white PNG images)

21/04/2011
Fixed deleted answers background color

04/04/2011
Minor fix to recent badge text

01/04/2011
Minor fixes (reputation breakdown, comments, tabs, etc.)

11/03/2011
Minor fixes and optimizations.

28/02/2011 
Minor fixes and optimizations.

25/02/2011 - First Release
Version is still beta and not yet optimized.
